Interface IEnquiryController

All Known Implementing Classes:
EnquiryController
public interface IEnquiryController
Interface defining the contract for managing enquiries in the BTO housing system.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Enquiry
    createEnquiry(Applicant applicant, Project project, String content)
    Creates a new enquiry from an applicant regarding a project.
    boolean
    deleteEnquiry(Enquiry enquiry)
    Deletes an existing enquiry.
    boolean
    editEnquiry(Enquiry enquiry, String newContent)
    Edits the content of an existing enquiry.
    List<Enquiry>
    getAllEnquiries()
    Retrieves all enquiries in the system.
    List<Enquiry>
    getEnquiriesByApplicant(Applicant applicant)
    Retrieves all enquiries submitted by a specific applicant.
    List<Enquiry>

    Retrieves all enquiries related to a specific project.

    Finds an enquiry by its ID.

    void
    setEnquiries(List<Enquiry> enquiries)
    Sets the list of enquiries from an external source.

  • Method Details

    • createEnquiry

      Enquiry createEnquiry(Applicant applicant, Project project, String content)
      Creates a new enquiry from an applicant regarding a project.
      Parameters:
      applicant - The applicant submitting the enquiry
      project - The project the enquiry is about (can be null for general enquiries)
      content - The content of the enquiry
      Returns:
      The created Enquiry object

    • getEnquiriesByProject

      List<Enquiry> getEnquiriesByProject(Project project)
      Retrieves all enquiries related to a specific project.
      Parameters:
      project - The project to get enquiries for
      Returns:
      A list of enquiries for the specified project

    • getEnquiriesByApplicant

      List<Enquiry> getEnquiriesByApplicant(Applicant applicant)
      Retrieves all enquiries submitted by a specific applicant.
      Parameters:
      applicant - The applicant to get enquiries for
      Returns:
      A list of enquiries submitted by the specified applicant

    • editEnquiry

      boolean editEnquiry(Enquiry enquiry, String newContent)
      Edits the content of an existing enquiry.
      Parameters:
      enquiry - The enquiry to edit
      newContent - The new content for the enquiry
      Returns:
      true if the edit was successful, false otherwise

    • deleteEnquiry

      boolean deleteEnquiry(Enquiry enquiry)
      Deletes an existing enquiry.
      Parameters:
      enquiry - The enquiry to delete
      Returns:
      true if the deletion was successful, false otherwise

    • respondToEnquiry

      boolean respondToEnquiry(Enquiry enquiry, String response, User respondedBy)
      Responds to an enquiry.
      Parameters:
      enquiry - The enquiry to respond to
      response - The response text
      respondedBy - The user who is responding
      Returns:
      true if the response was recorded successfully, false otherwise

    • getAllEnquiries

      List<Enquiry> getAllEnquiries()
      Retrieves all enquiries in the system.
      Returns:
      A list of all enquiries

    • getPendingEnquiries

      List<Enquiry> getPendingEnquiries()
      Retrieves all pending (unanswered) enquiries in the system.
      Returns:
      A list of enquiries that have not yet been responded to

    • getEnquiryById

      Enquiry getEnquiryById(int enquiryId)
      Finds an enquiry by its ID.
      Parameters:
      enquiryId - The ID of the enquiry to find
      Returns:
      The Enquiry object if found, null otherwise

    • setEnquiries

      void setEnquiries(List<Enquiry> enquiries)
      Sets the list of enquiries from an external source.
      Parameters:
      enquiries - The list of enquiries to set
